org.schwering.evi.conf
Class MainConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.conf.MainConfiguration
public abstract class MainConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Administers the main configuration file.
The format of the file is quite simple: 

 key=value
 # This is a comment
You just have to know the keys :-).

Version:
$Id: MainConfiguration.java 19 2006-05-06 20:41:09Z schwering $
Author:
Christoph Schwering (schwering@gmail.com)

Field Detail

CONFIG_DIR

public static final java.io.File CONFIG_DIR
The program's config dir.
It is tried to set it to ${user.home}/.evi.

MAIN_CONFIG_FILE

public static final java.io.File MAIN_CONFIG_FILE
The main configuration file.
It is tried to set it to CONFIG_DIR/modules.

Method Detail

load

public static void load()
Loads the URLs. If an exception is thrown, this method shows an ExceptionDialog. This method also adds a shutdownhook which invokes store().

store

public static void store()
Stores the properties.

getKeys

public static java.lang.String[] getKeys()
Returns all keys in an array.

Returns:
All configuration keys.

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
Grabs a String out of the configuration.
Default value is "".

Parameters:
key - The key.
Returns:
The String.

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                         java.lang.String def)
Grabs a String out of the configuration.
If the requested value does not exist, a new property with the key and the default value is set.

Parameters:
key - The key.
def - The default value.
Returns:
The String.

getDimension

public static java.awt.Dimension getDimension(java.lang.String key)
Grabs a dimension with format <width>x<height>.
The default is 0x0 which is probably not very useful.

Parameters:
key - The key.
Returns:
A new point.
